history.author: darby_mitchell
history.post: This subject should probably be a new post. I, too am interested in the demarcation (fold?) between front and back images on the shroud. What looks to be a burst of light is just here. Has anyone theorized on this?.
history.title: Yannick’s Nice Surprise:  Folding Test on the Enrie

misc.author: darby_mitchell
misc.post: If I claim to be an agnostic I am saying simply that ‘I don’t know’–I neither disclaim nor affirm, which is an intelligent approach to this topic. Good statement!.
misc.title: Clarification: Quake DID NOT reveal day of Jesus’ crucifixion
